tests.name: No name given
tests.message: expected two_fer() to be One for you, one for me., got One for failure, one for me.
tests.test_code: testing.expect_value(t, two_fer(), "One for you, one for me.")

tests.name: A name given
tests.test_code: testing.expect_value(t, two_fer("Alice"), "One for Alice, one for me.")

tests.name: Another name given
tests.test_code: testing.expect_value(t, two_fer("Bob"), "One for Bob, one for me.")
